price: 60 Malheur aux impies qui auront à affronter le Jour dont ils sont aujourd’hui menacés !
arabic: فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مِن يَوۡمِهِمُ ٱلَّذِي يُوعَدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: fawaylun lilladhīna kafarū min yawmihimu alladhī yūʿadūna
